titles.title: Opioid QuOTA Act
Opioid Quota Openness, Transparency, and Awareness Act of 2016
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to require the Attorney General to make procurement quotas for opioid analgesics publicly available, and for other purposes.
Opioid QuOTA Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Opioid Quota Openness, Transparency, and Awareness Act of 2016 or the Opioid QuOTA Act
This bill amends the Controlled Substances Act to require the Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) to publish on its website certain information with respect to a registered manufacturer’s opioid procurement quota.
It defines the term "opioid procurement quota" as a quota established by the DEA for the quantity of opioid analgesics that a registered manufacturer may procure.
